Welcome to Willow Point Townhomes!
This is a 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1493 Sq.
Ft.
Welcome to Willow Point Townhomes!
You will know that you have arrived home when you enter any one of our spacious 2 or 3 bedroom open floor plans.
Beautiful crown molding and quartz countertops, soft close cabinets and drawers, walk-in closets, and brand new appliances will give you the feeling of luxury you deserve.
Park your vehicle in an attached two-car garage or relax outside in your own gated outdoor area.
With an ideal location, our gated community is nestled perfectly between Beautiful Downtown Denver and Aurora.
With close proximity to some of the best shopping districts, dining, and nightlife will offer a convenience you cannot beat.
Come and see why you will want to reside with Willow Point Townhomes.
Pet Policy
We allow neutered/spayed cats and dogs, one year and older; no puppies or kittens allowed.
We allow two (2) pets per townhome maximum.
A refundable Pet Deposit in the amount of $250.00 per pet and a Non-Refundable Pet Fee of $250 per pet is required.
Monthly pet rent shall apply as follows: $30.00 for one pet / $50.00 for two pets.
Pet rent is subject to change.
We require evidence provided by a veterinarian of age, breed, weight of pet(s), that pet vaccinations are current and that the pet(s) is neutered or spayed.
Weight restriction (regardless of breed): eighty-five (85lbs) per animal.

Prohibited Breeds: Dobermans, Pit Bull's and any Pit Bull mixes, American Staffordshire Terrier, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Chows, Akitas, German Shepherds, Presa Canario, Cane Corso, Alaskan Malamutes, and Rottweilers will not be accepted.
Exotic pets will not be allowed.
These include, but are not limited to snakes, turtles, iguanas, ferrets, rodents, and rabbits.
Office Hours:
Tuesday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
